events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this case and respond to the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund accurately?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should receive the money back within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and for resolving my refund so promptly.
The refund was processed successfully on our end. Please check your payment method in the next few days.
We’re reaching out to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
I received the refund today, and everything is perfect now. Thank you so much for the support!
We are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime if you have more questions or concerns.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to help us improve our service.
